---
title: "FLR objects"
output: html_document
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(FLCore)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
attach("data/assstock_results.Rdata")
ls(2)
slotNames(ass.stock)
ca <- as.data.frame(catch.n(ass.stock)) %>% 
  tbl_df()
glimpse(ca)
ggplot(ca, aes(year, age, size = data)) + 
  theme_bw() +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_size_area(max_size = 20)

wC <- as.data.frame(catch.wt(ass.stock)) %>% 
  tbl_df() 
glimpse(wC)
wC %>% 
  mutate(yc=year - age) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, data, group = age)) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_line() +
  geom_line(aes(group = yc), col = "grey")
````
